subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Rev. Jerry Falwell Found Unconscious
body:
A Liberty University executive says the Rev. Jerry Falwell is in "gravely 
serious'' condition after being found unconscious in his office.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
